articles.title: Michigan State basketball vs. Penn State: Time for game on Peacock - Detroit Free Press
articles.description: Michigan State basketball starts Big Ten play back up on Thursday against Penn State, with the game only available on Peacock.
articles.content:
It's funny how much can change over the course of a month in college basketball.

articles.title: The Newest Sports Prodigy Is a 16-Year-Old Who Lives on Kebabs and Orange Soda - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Luke Littler, recently a high school junior from northern England, came up just short of becoming the youngest world champion in the history of professional darts
articles.content:
